seo.title: Donate - Menhera Bot
seo.description: Menhera is a project without any ambition just to entertain people. Help keep the project alive by donating any monetary amount.

title: Help me to keep awake!
description: Menhera is a personal project that I code whenever I feel like programming. If you like the project and want to help in any way, send a donation. You can support the project with the Github Sponsors.
